name: K2-remove-steel-pipes
title: Krastorio 2 remove steel pipes
author: Nezgal
description:
Removes everything related to steel pipes in Krastorio 2 and reworks some technologies requirements. Integrates with Fluid must flow
  - Removes steel pipes, steel underground pipe, steel pump
  - Replaces steel pipe ingredient with pipe in the recipes for : big storage tank, huge storage tank, advanced chemical plant, matter plant, matter associator
  - Technology steel fluid tanks requires fluid handling instead of steel fluid handling
  - FMF ducts require steel fluid tanks. Tech price changed. Iron plates and gears replaced with steel equivalent
  - Remove basic tech card from technologies : steel fluid tanks, gas power station, fuel, silicon processing, advanced lab
  - Remove logistic tech card from : flare stack
